name: Intrigue at the Museum: A Mystery Scavenger Hunt
description:
Back by popular demand, our classic mystery scavenger hunt returns!

There has been a mysterious murder, and the museum's collections hold the key.  As you gather clues, you’ll begin to piece together a tale of greed, lust, pride, and revenge. Working in teams, sleuths travel through the museum's galleries solving whodunnit, where, and with what. Will your team solve the mystery before the clock runs out?

Note:  At least one player per team must bring a phone with our scavenger hunt app downloaded for submitting answers and creative team photos and videos during the adventure. Click on our link to book your tickets, and see more details about your upcoming hunt!

name: Breaking Bard: An Improvised Shakespeare
description:
Get ready to laugh and be amazed as talented improvisers bring the works of Shakespeare to life in a whole new way! No scripts, just pure creativity and wit as they create worlds on the spot inspired by the Bard's famous plays. Whether you're a Shakespeare aficionado or just looking for a fun night out, this event is sure to entertain!

Breaking Bard is:
Emma Grabinsky, Ryan Sheedy, Maria Besko, Frank Nicolson, Janek Gonsalkorale, Tim Mikula
